short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 点击图标，编辑网页，也可以复制
short.en: Edit or Copy WebPage by one click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
开启当前网页的“编辑模式”，从而也能复制部分受限网页的内容。

详见：https://github.com/gantrol/edit_or_copy_page

注：此插件对Canvas或图片内的内容无效。
long.en:
Editing website by one click and bypassing part of restrictions on copying imposed by certain websites

Note: This extension doesn't work on content in Canvas or images.
